flawed_nl_solution:
Monty needs to feed 36 family members and each chicken/meal combo feeds 6 people so he needs 36/6 = <<36/6=6.0>>6.0 combos
Each chicken/meal combo costs $12.0 and he needs 6.0 so it will cost him 12.0*6.0 = $<<12.0*6.0=27.0>>27.0 to feed everyone

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72.0, not 27.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
